entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Snow level 600 metres. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:08 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
